details.overview: Order a commemorative marriage certificate for a gift or keepsake to mark a silver, ruby, golden or diamond wedding anniversary
details.more_information:
Your original marriage details are printed on a specially designed certificate and mounted in a presentation box.

You'll need to place your order at least 10 working days before the date you need it.
details.introduction: Register on the General Register Office website to buy a special certificate to mark a silver (25th), ruby (40th), golden (50th) or diamond (60th) wedding anniversary. Certificates cost Â£23.40.
details.alternate_methods:
###Post
To order certificates by post, complete the application form and send it to the General Register Office. The address is on the form.

$D [Download 'Commemorative marriage certificates' application form (PDF, 264KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/@government/documents/digitalasset/dg_176220.pdf "Download 'Commemorative marriage certificates' application form (PDF, 264KB)"){:rel="external"} $D

###Registry offices
You can also order certificates from the [local register office](/register-offices "local register office") where the marriage was registered.
expectations: Available in England and Wales only
